Product_Name: Trudon Cire Candle 3kg
full_description: Deo regique laborant - they work for God and King. Trudon Cire Classic Candle celebrates the humble bee, an integral part of the Maison's history and emblazoned on every candle and box. Scented with warm waxed wood and beeswax absolute, this candle is an ode to the centuries of craftsmanship, and the vitally important creatures that make it possible.What are the notes in Trudon Cire Candle?Head: Bergamot. Waxed Wood. Honey.Heart: Beeswax Absolute. Sandalwood essential oil. Cinnamon essential oil.Base: Tonka Bean. Patchouli essential oil. Musk. Vanilla.Why will I love Trudon Cire Candle 3kg?Burn time of over 300 hoursVegetable wax based candleSmoke free burnArtisanal glass, crafted by hand in Vinci, ItalyCotton wick adapted to each fragranceGreat style candle, 21.5cm height and 18cm diameter3kg Cire Trudon: Candles With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the Latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.” How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles?The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.

Product_Name: Alpha-H Liquid Gold Trial Kit
Skin Concern: Dull, dry or dehydrated skin, First signs of ageing, Pigmentation, uneven skin tone
Skin Type: Dry, Normal to dry, Normal to oily, Oily
full_description: Experience the iconic radiance-boosting goodness of Liquid Gold for yourself. The cult favourite Alpha-H Liquid Gold is a skin rejuvenating powerhouse, containing 5% Glycolic Acid and Licorice Extract to exfoliate skin and reveal a more toned and satin-smooth appearance. Alpha H Liquid Gold works like an at-home chemical exfoliant with the AHA Glycolic Acid, gently clearing away dead skin cells and debris, improving skin tone and texture while it's at it. This Alpha-H Liquid Gold Trial Kit includes 9 single-use satchets to reveal gorgeous luminous skin in 21 days. Simply swipe a pre-soaked cotton pad onto the face like you would a toner and enjoy the glow-boosting benefits. What are the key benefits of the Alpha-H Liquid Gold Trial Kit?Radiance boosting trial kitResurfaces and brightens dull-looking skinRejuvenates ageing skinSmooths out the appearance of fine linesStrengthens the skin's barrierImproves the appearance of pigmentation, age spots and blemish scarringSkin tone becomes visibly brighter, smoother and clearerRecommended for the signs of sun damageWhat are the key ingredients of the Alpha-H Liquid Gold?Glycolic ExtractA type of Alpha Hydroxy Acid, glycolic acid works to exfoliate and brighten the appearance of skin tone and texture. It has a small molecular size to penetrate deep into the dermis and also acts like a delivery vehicle for other ingredients.Licorice ExtractIts soothing and brightening properties work to improve the appearance of dark spots and the visible signs of aging.Silk ProteinsThe natural amino acid and lipid oil content bind moisture, improving skin clarity, radiance and texture.GlycerinA powerful humectant that works to draw and bind moisture from the air into the surface levels of the skin, helping to maintain moisture balance.How do you use Alpha-H Liquid Gold?The Alpha-H Liquid Gold should be applied every second evening after cleansing.Simply swipe a pre-soaked pad onto a clean face (avoiding the eye area). Feel the tingle in 3 seconds. Notice a visible glow in 3 nights (or less!). See skin transformed in just 3 weeks.If you'd like to experience the full effects of the Liquid Gold it's recommended that you don't use any other products after use, however if your skin is more sensitive, applying a moisturiser or serum afterward will help dull the strength. It's normal to experience a tingling sensation for a few minutes after the application of Alpha H Liquid Gold.

Product_Name: OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art SO INTO BLUE
full_description: There's instant, and then there's instant - introducing OPI XPRESS/On Nail Art. These high quality press-on nails make a gel-like, salon-quality manicure quick and easy to apply, and deliver 14 days of stunning wear - plus, nails can be reused again and again.   Available in a selection of designs ranging from the classic French Press to the fun Tastes Like Strawberries, with both short classic options as well as long, almond-shaped nails.Ready to switch things up? Continue the fun with XPRESS/On Effects, or find favourite OPI shades in Long and Short lengths.Each kit includes everything you need for perfect application, with 30 nails in different sizes, nail glue, a prep pad, cuticle stick and duo file/buffer.Why will I love OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art?Press-on nail kitFast and easy to applyRe-usable Each application provides 14 days of wearAvailable in a range of fun and elegant styles including glittery tips and the classic French maniShorter, rounded shapes as well as longer, almond-shaped designsAlso available in Iconic Shades Short, Iconic Shades Long and EffectsVeganContains 30 nails, 2g nail glue, dual file/buffer, cuticle stick and prep padHow to apply OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art:First, find your fit - cover your natural nail with each press-on to find the perfect size.If desired, shape the end of your press-on with the Shape Up side of the file.File or clip your natural nails as needed, and lightly buff the surface of the nail.Remove dust and debris from natural nails with the included prep pad, then gently push back cuticles with the included stick.Remove the glue cap and gently squeeze the bottle. For longer wear, apply glue both to the back of the press-on nail and your natural nail. For short term wear, only apply glue to the press-on nail.Place press-on nails onto natural nails and hold down gently for 30 seconds.To remove, soak nails in warm water for 10 minutes, then use the cuticle stick to gently lift off. If needed, you can apply a small amount of acetone to the nail base using a cotton swab.

Product_Name: Trudon Cyrnos Petit Candle 70gm
full_description: A sunny, verdant scented candle from Cire Trudon, in a petite 70gm size.  A sunny little villa in Cyrnos, surrounded by deep blue Mediterranean shores. A gentle salt breeze in a verdant garden. The aroma of Provence, dappled sunlight through a citrus garden. Cire Trudon Cyrnos Petit Candle is a fresh aromatic citrus candle with a base of green woods. A single wick, vegetable wax candle, Cire Trudon candles are known for their evocative qualities, with Cyrnos bringing forth a sense of summer in paradise. More than a simple citrus aromatic candle, Cyrnos expertly blends green notes of pine and thyme, interwoven with cashmere wood and cedarwood for a complex fragrance journey. What are the notes of Cire Trudon Cyrnos Candle?Head: Lemon. Myrtle. Thyme.Heart: Black fig. Cedarwood. Lavender. Pine.Base: Cashmere wood. Musk. Patchouli.What are the features & benefits of Cire Trudon Cyrnos Candle Classic?18 to 20 hour burn timeVegetable wax based candleSmoke free burnArtisanal glass, crafted by hand in Vinci, ItalyCotton wick adapted to each fragrancePetite size candle, 70gm Cire Trudon: Candles With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.” How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles?The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.
how_to_use: How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles? The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot. When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.If this product is sealed, please ensure the seal is intact prior to using the product.
ingredients: Vegetable waxes, cotton wick.

Product_Name: Trudon Abd El Kader Room Spray
full_description: Spiced tea, fresh tobacco. The cool night air of the desert refreshes the mind and the body. Trudon Abd El Kader Room Spray is an inviting green scent, with a charming combination of spiced tea and fresh tobacco. Refreshing mint is joined by a heart of black tea with ginger, clove, smooth blackcurrant and apple.What are the features & benefits of Cire Trudon Abd El Kader Room Spray?Artisanal glass, crafted by hand in TuscanyLarge glass bottle contains 375mlComes with a spritz nozzle and atomiser bulbExtremely fine room fragrance mistUp to 9 months of daily use Cire Trudon: Fine Fragrance With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles & room sprays are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.” How do I use the Cire Trudon Room Spray?Using your preferred perfume distributor, whether nozzle or atomiser bulb, spritz 1-4 times into the air, taking care to not spritz where it may be inhaled.Store your Cire Trudon Room Spray away from heat and light. Do not swallow, and take immediate medical advice if swallowed. In case of eye contact, rinse with water and seek medical advice. Keep away from children and pets, and avoid contact with skin.
how_to_use: How do I use the Cire Trudon Room Spray?Using your preferred perfume distributor, whether nozzle or atomiser bulb, spritz 1-4 times into the air, taking care to not spritz where it may be inhaled.Store your Cire Trudon Room Spray away from heat and light. Do not swallow, and take immediate medical advice if swallowed. In case of eye contact, rinse with water and seek medical advice. Keep away from children and pets, and avoid contact with skin.

Product_Name: Trudon Ernesto Alabaster Candle with Lid
full_description: Fresh cuban cigars, the comforting murmur of a close-to-hand radio... and revolution on the mind. Trudon Ernesto Alabaster Candle reimagines the best-selling scent in a stunning new stone vessel, complete with a matching lid.Inspired by Havana, Ernesto is a leather scented candle that presents top notes of rhum and bergamot to create a fresh, yet contradictorily natural-earthy aroma. Oak moss, amber and patchouli to provide warmth and balance. A well-rounded aroma, beautiful for living rooms and studies.What are the notes of Cire Trudon Ernesto Candle?Head: Rhum. Grapefruit. Bergamot.Heart: Clove. Oak wood. Patchouli. Labdanum.Base: Tobacco. Moss. Leather. Amber.Trudon's Alabaster Candle range gives each scent new luminosity, with a translucent vessel that creates a halo of light when lit. Sculpted in Spain out of a single block, each Alabaster container and matching lid is unique, with veins along the surface creating a one-of-a-kind home accessory. The traditional Trudon logo is replaced with a minimalist golden design, allowing the natural stone to shine. What are the features & benefits of Trudon Ernesto Alabaster Candle?Burn time of 55 - 60 hoursVegetable wax based candleSmoke free burnOne of a kind alabaster vesselSculpted in Spain from a single stone blockIncludes matching lidCotton wick adapted to each fragranceClassic style candle, 10.5cm height Cire Trudon: Candles With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.” How do I care for my Cire Trudon candles?The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.

Product_Name: Napoleon Perdis Camera Finish Concealer - DN26
full_description: Get second skin comfort and smooth, creamy coverage with Napoleon Perdis Camera Finish Concealer. Ideal to use under the eyes or anywhere on the face, this concealer minimises dark circles, redness and discolouration. It offers medium-to-full coverage and a soft focus, natural matte finish, for flawless skin that still looks real.Why will I love Napoleon Perdis Camera Finish Concealer?Creamy concealerNatural matte finishMedium to full coverageUse under the eyes or anywhere on the face  Contains Vitamin E to help protect and nourish skinParaben-freeVegan4mlNapoleon Perdis Camera Finish Concealer features a creamy, ultra-blendable formula. Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E, it helps keep skin feeling comfortable and hydrated. It's suited to all skin types, and the range includes a corrective shade designed for under-eye discolouration in medium to deep skin tones.How do I apply Napoleon Perdis Camera Finish Concealer?Use the included applicator to apply a small amount of concealer under the eyes, around the nose or anywhere you want some extra coverage.Dampen a makeup sponge and gently pat to blend concealer.For fuller coverage, diffuse concealer with a sponge, or blend with a brush for a lighter finish.Shade CPC27 is a corrective, pink-toned shade designed to neutralise under-eye discolouration in medium to deep skin tones. Apply and blend a small amount on any areas of discolouration, and follow with the shade that matches your skin tone.

Product_Name: OPI Nature Strong - For What It's Earth
full_description: For lasting colour and shine, all in a formula made from up to 75% naturally-derived ingredients, there's OPI Nature Strong Nail Polish. Available in a range of earth-inspired shades ranging from brights to neutrals, OPI Nature Strong delivers up to seven days of wear and shine.For What It's Earth is a neutral pink shade, inspired by nature's subtle beauty.Why will I love OPI Nature Strong Nail Polish in For What It's Earth?Neutral pink nail polishMade from up to 75% natural origin ingredientsUp to seven days of wear and shinePair with OPI Nature Strong Top Coat for best resultsBottle and cap made from 20% PCR plasticMade in the USAVegan formula15mlOPI's Nature Strong Nail Polish range combines the same high performance and bold shade range you know and love with a new, naturally-derived formula. Nature Strong polishes are vegan, and made from up to 75% natural origin and 84% bio-sourced ingredients. The bottles and cap are made from 20% post-consumer recycled plastic.How do I use OPI Nature Strong Nail Polish?Shake the bottle well before application, to help avoid streaks.Apply two thin coats to each nail. Product_Name: Benefit Boi-ing Bright on Concealer - shade 11 - Hazelnut
Product_Colour: 11 Hazelnut - deeper tan-peach for deep brown/gray undereye discoloration
full_description: Banish dark circles and bring on the brightness with Benefit Boi-ing Bright On Concealer. Blending the best of makeup and skincare, this creamy concealer targets dullness, dark circles and dryness - talk about a triple threat! Red algae extract and a vitamin C derivative help visibly brighten skin, while colour-correcting pigments neutralise dark circles, and the serum-like texture seals in moisture.    Why will I love Benefit Boi-ing Bright On Concealer?Under-eye concealerHelps brighten, colour-correct and hydrate skinBuildable, luminous coverageLasts up to 8 hours*Lightweight, silky formulaColour-correcting pigments minimise dark circles     Hydrating serum-like textureWater-resistantFormulated with red algae extract and vitamin C derivativePair with Boi-ing Cakeless Concealer for a full coverage finish94% said finish is luminous**95% said skin looks soft & supple**Lightweight and comfortable to wear, Benefit Bright On Concealer has buildable coverage and a luminous finish, and lasts up to 8 hours*.Discover the Benefit dream team - Boi-ing Bright On Concealer pairs perfectly with Boi-ing Cakeless Concealer, for a full coverage, skin-brightening finish.*instrumental test on 20 participants**self-evaluation by 103 participants after 1 weekHow do I apply Benefit Boi-ing Bright On Concealer?Apply three small dots of concealer to each undereye using the doe foot applicator. Gently blend using your fingertip, from the inner corner towards the outer corner. Layer for additional brightening and touch up throughout the day if needed.Beauty Tip:Dot & blend Boi-ing Bright On Concealer on cheekbones & bridge of nose for a brightening boost.What shade should I wear?If you usually wear a fair or light concealer, or Boi-ing Cakeless Concealer in any shade between 0.5 All Good (fairest cool) and 5 Feel Good (light warm), try Lychee, Nectarine or Cantaloupe.If you usually wear a medium to tan concealer, or Boi-ing Cakeless Concealer in any shade between 6 Fly High (medium cool) and 9.25 Pep Talk (tan golden), try Melon, Ginger, Peach, Almond or Apricot.If you usually wear a deep/dark concealer, or Boi-ing Cakeless Concealer in any shade between 9.5 Power Up (deep neutral) and 17 Your Way (deepest-dark warm), try Nutmeg, Walnut, Hazelnut or Clove.

Product_Name: Trudon Fragrance Coffret 5 x 15ml
full_description: Experience the distinctive and unique scents of Trudon with the Trudon Fragrance Coffret. Containing five 15ml travel sprays, this discovery set is presented in a dark blue gift box.Trudon Fragrance Coffret includes the following scents:Medie 15mlA carefree, understated citrus scent, with a cedar base.Elae 15ml A feminine and ethereal floral fragrance with an unexpected twist.Aphelie 15mlA green, vegetal fragrance with notes of rose, ivy, blackcurrant and moss.II (Deux) 15mlA lush green cologne with notes of pine and cedar.Mortel 15mlA spicy, intense and compelling fragrance with notes of cedar and black pepperWhat else do I need to know about Trudon Eaux de Parfum?Cire Trudon perfumes are stunning, and they tend to develop a little as you wear them. Select your scent for its heart and base notes, rather than the initial head notes. This will give you a truer idea of how the perfume will smell. Cire Trudon: Scents with history Cire Trudon fragrances have the same sense of history, complexity and creativity as their candles. These eau de parfum scents are compelling and unique - you won't be wearing the same perfume as every other person at the bar. They're perfumes for perfume lovers. Once, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.”

Product_Name: Trudon Versailles Petit 70g candle
full_description: Introducing Trudon Versailles Petite Candle, a refreshing floral candle in a miniature size that pays homage to the  beloved palatial gardens first planted to entertain a king and his court. Taking inspiration from the scent of a French garden in spring, Trudon Versailles features notes of peony, herbs, tuberose and honeysuckle. It's refined but with a touch of whimsy, a nod to the legendary festivities hosted by Louis XIV.What are the notes in Trudon Versailles Petite Candle?Head: Peony, mint, thyme flowerHeart: Rosemary, linden, tuberose absoluteBase: Honeysuckle, oak wood, blue irisPresented in vibrant azure vessels inspired by the sky blue of a fresco, the Trudon Versailles collection links together the opulence of the palace with the carefully-tended - and equally as extravagant - gardens. Why will I love Trudon Versailles Petite Candle?Refreshing floral fragrance Contains notes of peony, herbs, tuberose and oakBurn time of 18 - 20 hoursVegetable wax based candleSmoke free burnArtisanal glass, crafted by hand in Vinci, ItalyCotton wick adapted to each fragrancePetite style candle, 6.5cm height70g Trudon: Candles With HistoryOnce, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.”How do I care for my Trudon candles?The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.
how_to_use: The first time you light your Cire Trudon candle is the most important. Ensure that you leave your candle on until the surface is completely liquid - if the wax is still solid towards the edges, the candle will create a tunnel rather than burning smoothly throughout its life span. Do not allow candle to burn longer than 3 hours.If the wick shifts, reposition it while the wax is still warm, but not hot.When the candle cools, protect its surface with a bell jar or cloche to prevent dust build up.Never leave your candle unattended. Keep candles away from pets and children, and away from draughts and curtains. Protect the surface you burn your candle on with a wooden base or small plate.

Product_Name: Trudon Isla EDP 100ml
full_description: An escapade on the shores of the Mediterranean. Evoking a sunscape on the horizon, the original duo composed of a perfume - Isla - and a scented candle - de Oro - highlights the many facets of bergamot.This collection, is born from a close collaboration with Emilie Bouge, historical and key partner of the brand, who created some of the most iconic home scents but also eaux de parfum for Trudon.Isla, an eau de Parfum unveiling a bright, zesty and fresh accord all about one the most emblematic citrus fruits of the Mediterranean region: bergamot. Product_Name: OPI xPRESS/ON Business Casual
full_description: There's instant, and then there's instant - introducing OPI XPRESS/On Nail Art. These high quality press-on nails make a gel-like, salon-quality manicure quick and easy to apply, and deliver 14 days of stunning wear - plus, nails can be reused again and again.   Available in a selection of designs ranging from the classic French Press to the fun Tastes Like Strawberries, with both short classic options as well as long, almond-shaped nails.Ready to switch things up? Continue the fun with XPRESS/On Effects, or find favourite OPI shades in Long and Short lengths.Each kit includes everything you need for perfect application, with 30 nails in different sizes, nail glue, a prep pad, cuticle stick and duo file/buffer.Why will I love OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art?Press-on nail kitFast and easy to applyRe-usable Each application provides 14 days of wearAvailable in a range of fun and elegant styles including glittery tips and the classic French maniShorter, rounded shapes as well as longer, almond-shaped designsAlso available in Iconic Shades Short, Iconic Shades Long and EffectsVeganContains 30 nails, 2g nail glue, dual file/buffer, cuticle stick and prep padHow to apply OPI xPRESS/on Nail Art:First, find your fit - cover your natural nail with each press-on to find the perfect size.If desired, shape the end of your press-on with the Shape Up side of the file.File or clip your natural nails as needed, and lightly buff the surface of the nail.Remove dust and debris from natural nails with the included prep pad, then gently push back cuticles with the included stick.Remove the glue cap and gently squeeze the bottle. For longer wear, apply glue both to the back of the press-on nail and your natural nail. For short term wear, only apply glue to the press-on nail.Place press-on nails onto natural nails and hold down gently for 30 seconds.To remove, soak nails in warm water for 10 minutes, then use the cuticle stick to gently lift off. If needed, you can apply a small amount of acetone to the nail base using a cotton swab.

Product_Name: Bobbi Brown Weightless Skin Foundation Warm Espresso
full_description: Looking for long-wear that loves you back? Introducing Bobbi Brown Weightless Skin Foundation, an all-day (and all-night) foundation that delivers lasting oil control and 24 hours of moisture and wear. A skin-like natural matte finish and medium coverage are designed to give you your best skin yet, while the lightweight formula feels comfortable and breathable.Why will I love Bobbi Brown Weightless Skin Foundation?Long-wearing foundationMedium coverageNatural matte finish24 hours of wear and hydrationControls shine and oil all dayLightweight, breathable feelSuits a wide range of skin types and tonesContains SPF 15Resists sweat, humidity, transferring, fading and creasingWaterproof30mlBobbi Brown's Smart Skin-Balancing technology allows for both all-day oil control and hydration, making it suitable for a wide range of skin types including oily, dry, combination and normal. Lightweight silicas absorb excess oil and control shine without compromising skin's moisture levels, while hyaluronic acid, glycerin and honey extract keep even dry areas hydrated. How to use:Pump foundation onto the back of your hand and buff into face with a foundation brush, starting at the centre or wherever needs the most coverage. Use soft, circular motions for medium coverage or pressing motions for fuller coverage.For the most skin-like finish, apply and blend out with fingers, gently gliding and pressing along the face.

The innovative teardrop-shaped bullet makes application easy, with a precision tip that effortlessly sculpts and lines, while the rounded base allows for complete lip coverage in a single swipe.Why will I love MAKE UP FOR EVER Rouge Artist For Ever Lipstick?Long-wearing lipstickAvailable in velvet-matte and satin finishesCreamy, lightweight feelUp to 16 hours of colourTeardrop-shaped bullet for precision applicationFormulated with passionfruit seed oil and coconut extractPackaging made up of 72% recycled materialsVegan2.4gAll shades contain passionfruit seed oil to help nourish and comfort, and the satin shades feature the addition of coconut extract for extra moisture and shine.How to use:Start by lining lips with a corresponding Artist Colour Pencil for extra definition and staying power.Swipe lipstick on to lips, using the precision tip at the high points of the lips to define the cupid's bow.Match the pointed tip to the outer corners and swipe the rounded base across the bottom lip.

Product_Name: The Goodnight Co Calm Blend Pure Essential Oil
full_description: Find your peace of mind with The Goodnight Co Calm Blend Pure Essential Oil, a carefully crafted blend designed to soothe your stress and uplift your spirit. Made with 100% natural ingredients, this essential oil blend is a powerful ally in your journey to relaxation and well-being. Featuring a harmonious mix of lavender, mandarin, bergamot, ylang-ylang, chamomile, and cedarwood, this blend works to calm an anxious mind, ease nervous tension, and rejuvenate your entire body. Whether you're looking to unwind after a long day, find focus in the middle of a hectic schedule, or simply add a touch of tranquillity to your daily routine, the Calm Blend is your perfect companion.Why You'll Love the Goodnight Co Calm Blend Pure Essential OilContains 7 exclusively blended essential oils for maximum calming effect Key ingredients include Lavender, Mandarin, and Geranium for stress relief Naturally calms the mind and rejuvenates the body Uplifts the spirit and eases anxiety Versatile use: diffuse, bathe, laundry, inhale, or apply topically All-natural ingredients made in Australia No synthetic fragrances; only pure essential oils Vegan and cruelty-free
how_to_use: Five simple ways to enjoy our Calm Blend Essential Oil: Diffuse it to rebalance your mood, add a few drops to your bath for a relaxing soak, enhance your laundry by adding it to your wash, inhale for instant calm, or apply topically to pulse points using our Essential Oil Roll Ons.

Product_Name: Modibodi Sensual Hi Waist Bikini Light-Moderate Black 22/4XL
full_description: The Modibodi Sensual Hi Waist Bikini in Light-Moderate Black is crafted from soft bamboo with a delicate lace waistband and a discreet, leak-proof lining that absorbs light periods. This bikini features a higher leg and sits comfortably on the hip for a snug fit, feeling just like regular underwear but with a built-in 3mm patented lining to absorb your period. This will activate the technology in the lining for maximum absorbency.Rinse first, gentle cold machine wash, hang to dry, reuse, repeat.

Product_Name: Gucci Beauty Concentré De Beauté Concealer - 35W
full_description: Gucci Beauty Concentré De Beauté liquid concealer is the multi-use tool to carry with you - anywhere and everywhere. This lightweight and stretchable texture can be used for targeted and all-over application to conceal, brighten and even the skin. It blends well for a long wear yet breathable, second-skin finish. Powered by skin-caring ingredients, this Gucci concealer is non-drying, non-marking, non-creasing and delivers soothing, hydrating and smoothing properties. Skin and eye bags look smoothed over time*. ​Available in 40 shades. ​   The formulaA balanced combination of specific film formers offers a long wear natural blurred effect while letting skin breathe for a second-skin finish. The colour stays true all day, doesn't crease and is transfer-resistant. Its stretchable texture contains coated pigments for both targeted and all-over application while offering even and buildable medium to high coverage.​ ​Infused with Black Rose Oil and Hyaluronic Acid, the formula provides antioxidant and soothing properties and makes skin feel hydrated all day. Its lightweight and very thin texture feels comfortable and breathable. The addition of Acmella flower helps smooth skin and eye bags.  The rangeA full range of 40 concealer shades matched to all skin tones - from deepest to lightest on every skin type - works harmoniously with the Gucci Beauty Eternité de Beauté foundation (sold separately). Calibrated across five shade families and three undertones: cool, neutral, and warm. Your perfect shadeEach shade is identified by two parts: 1. Numbers refer to the depth of your skin tone, from Fair (1X) to Deep (5X). 2. Letters correspond to your skin undertone. C for Cool - skin rarely tans, with pink hue; N for Neutral - skin tans sometimes, with both pink and golden hues; W for Warm - skin tans easily, with yellow or golden hue. Clinical results 81% say that bare skin looks smoothed over time* 78% say that eye bags look smoother over time* *based on 28-day study with 113 consumersMulti-use application (targeted or all over).Brightens, conceals and evens.Lightweight and stretchable texture.Long wear yet breathable, second-skin finish.Non-drying, non-marking, non-creasing.Soothing, hydrating and smoothing properties.Buildable medium to high coverage.Skin and eye bags look smoothed over time.Available in 40 shades.

Product_Name: Gucci Beauty Cushion De Beauté Foundation Refill - 08
full_description: Gucci Beauty introduces Cushion De Beauté, a luminous and moisturising foundation refill for the cushion compact that your skin will love. An ideal on-the-go beauty tool, this luminous cushion foundation features moisturising actives to help skin stay well hydrated for up to 24 hours. Thanks to the lightweight and non-sticky formula, this moisturising foundation ensures skin feels comfortable and fresh. The Gucci cushion foundation is easy to use, it goes on smoothly, blending seamlessly into the skin to provide natural-looking, buildable coverage.  This Gucci foundation features high-reflection index oils and mineral powders that maximize the reflection of light on the skin to provide a luminous flawless finish. A moisturizing complex composed of Glycol and Glycerin deeply hydrates skin for up to 24 hours, while the Black Rose Oil, one of Gucci Beauty's key ingredients, offers antioxidant protection. This luminous Gucci foundation's anti-pollution complex composed of Lipochroman and Butterfly Bush Extracts fights external aggressors, while mineral SPF 20 PA++ filters protect skin and help reduce the risk of sun damage. Available in a full range of twelve foundation shades designed for cool, neutral, and warm skin tones with a natural finish, making it easy to find your perfect shade. This buildable foundation refill allows you to reuse the pastel pink cushion compact, which comes complete with a mirror and a soft cushion applicator. A distinctive Gucci Beauty design featuring a lion pattern surrounded by a wreath of flowers adorns the top of the round casing.

full_description: Rouge à Lèvres Mat is a collection of intense beautiful colours with a long-lasting matte finish. Specially formulated with rich pigments and gelling waxes, this lipstick delivers rich colour with a soft creamy feel.    Formula and application:Rouge à Lèvres Mat Gucci lipstick delivers bright and rich lip colour with a soft and velvety feel. It has a silk-like texture enriched with oils and gelling waxes for a comfortable finish without drying out lips or colour smudging.  Design and range:The collection includes rich nudes, oranges, pinks, reds, purples, and a shade of majestic green so you're sure to find your perfect shade. Product_Name: Gucci Beauty Eternité De Beauté Foundation Spf 15 - 330W - Warm Medium
full_description: Gucci Éternité de Beauté 24-hour long lasting luminous matte foundation offers full coverage in one drop, yet with comfort** throughout the day. It is formulated with high skin affinity powders and coated pigments with an ultra-performant polymer technology that allows no transfer wear and shine control* that lasts all day.    Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Black Rose Oil, this Gucci foundation helps to boost and maintain skin hydration, while the Bamboo Powder helps to control shine. Blending the best of natural luminosity with a perfecting mattifying effect, this breathable and weightless foundation instantly blurs pores, evens the complexion, and blends away imperfections. The luminous matte finish is never dull and stays fresh all day long without looking cakey, perfect for everyday wear. Suitable for normal to oily skin, this moisturising foundation is available in 40 shades and made with SPF filters for skin protection.   The range: A full range of 40 beautiful foundation shades matched to all skin tones-from deepest (5XX) to lightest (1XX) for every skin type. Calibrated across five shade families and harmonised to four undertones: cool (C), neutral (N), warm (W), and olive (O).   Consumer test on 110 volunteers after 7 days of use:*90% say shine is controlled throughout the day **96% say their skin feels comfortable all day long24H wear no transferFull coverageWeightless breathable textureComfort and hydrationLuminous matte finishShine control

It is formulated with high skin affinity powders and coated pigments with an ultra-performant polymer technology that allows no transfer wear and shine control* that lasts all day.    Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Black Rose Oil, this Gucci foundation helps to boost and maintain skin hydration, while the Bamboo Powder helps to control shine. Blending the best of natural luminosity with a perfecting mattifying effect, this breathable and weightless foundation instantly blurs pores, evens the complexion, and blends away imperfections. The luminous matte finish is never dull and stays fresh all day long without looking cakey, perfect for everyday wear. Suitable for normal to oily skin, this moisturising foundation is available in 40 shades and made with SPF filters for skin protection.   The range: A full range of 40 beautiful foundation shades matched to all skin tones-from deepest (5XX) to lightest (1XX) for every skin type. Calibrated across five shade families and harmonised to four undertones: cool (C), neutral (N), warm (W), and olive (O).   Consumer test on 110 volunteers after 7 days of use:*90% say shine is controlled throughout the day **96% say their skin feels comfortable all day long24H wear no transferFull coverageWeightless breathable textureComfort and hydrationLuminous matte finishShine control

Product_Name: Gucci Beauty Concentré De Beauté Concealer - 47N
full_description: Gucci Beauty Concentré De Beauté liquid concealer is the multi-use tool to carry with you - anywhere and everywhere. This lightweight and stretchable texture can be used for targeted and all-over application to conceal, brighten and even the skin. It blends well for a long wear yet breathable, second-skin finish. Powered by skin-caring ingredients, this Gucci concealer is non-drying, non-marking, non-creasing and delivers soothing, hydrating and smoothing properties. Skin and eye bags look smoothed over time*. ​Available in 40 shades. ​   The formulaA balanced combination of specific film formers offers a long wear natural blurred effect while letting skin breathe for a second-skin finish. The colour stays true all day, doesn't crease and is transfer-resistant. Its stretchable texture contains coated pigments for both targeted and all-over application while offering even and buildable medium to high coverage.​ ​Infused with Black Rose Oil and Hyaluronic Acid, the formula provides antioxidant and soothing properties and makes skin feel hydrated all day. Its lightweight and very thin texture feels comfortable and breathable. The addition of Acmella flower helps smooth skin and eye bags.  The rangeA full range of 40 concealer shades matched to all skin tones - from deepest to lightest on every skin type - works harmoniously with the Gucci Beauty Eternité de Beauté foundation (sold separately). Calibrated across five shade families and three undertones: cool, neutral, and warm. Your perfect shadeEach shade is identified by two parts: 1. Numbers refer to the depth of your skin tone, from Fair (1X) to Deep (5X). 2. Letters correspond to your skin undertone. C for Cool - skin rarely tans, with pink hue; N for Neutral - skin tans sometimes, with both pink and golden hues; W for Warm - skin tans easily, with yellow or golden hue. Clinical results 81% say that bare skin looks smoothed over time* 78% say that eye bags look smoother over time* *based on 28-day study with 113 consumersMulti-use application (targeted or all over).Brightens, conceals and evens.Lightweight and stretchable texture.Long wear yet breathable, second-skin finish.Non-drying, non-marking, non-creasing.Soothing, hydrating and smoothing properties.Buildable medium to high coverage.Skin and eye bags look smoothed over time.Available in 40 shades.

Product_Name: Gucci Beauty Poudre De Beauté Mat Naturel Face Powder - 07
full_description: Poudre de Beauté Mat Naturel by Gucci Beauty is a buildable pressed powder that creates a unified complexion for a naturally perfected look. Indulge in the beauty rituals of yesteryear with the Poudre De Beauté Mat Naturel, offering a lightweight, visibly smooth texture. It is boosted by a delicate floral fragrance, enveloping the senses as it comes into contact with the face.  Formula and Application The formula of this makeup powder contains a brilliant combination of micro-reflecting lamellar powders and soft focus pigments spread smoothly on the skin surface for a unified complexion, while emollient agents provide a comfortable feel all day long.  The formula of this matte powder glides on with ease and allows for customised and buildable coverage, from natural to medium. When used alone, Poudre De Beauté Mat Naturel face powder creates a unified, naturally perfected complexion. The skin looks mattified with a natural finish. On top of foundation, this Gucci pressed powder sets make-up perfectly with a smooth finish that sits comfortably for as long as it is worn. Design and RangeEncased within a pale pink click compact with gold trim and mirror, Poudre De Beauté Mat Naturel face powder is emblazoned with Gucci lettering. Available in 14 shades and suitable for all skin types, its soft sponge applicator is crafted from microfibre textures and designed with a foldable two-material construction to allow for versatile application and coverage in hard-to-reach areas.

full_description: Hydrating for over 24 hours and long-lasting with high-shine power, Gucci Beauty Rouge De Beauté Brillant hydrating lipstick has the caring properties of a balm with the pigments of a lipstick.  Formula and application:Formulated with nourishing ingredients and antioxidants, the creamy texture of this moisturising lipstick highlights and preserves the natural beauty of your lips making them look fuller and moisturised in a range of beautiful colours.  Black rose oil, peony oil, and jojoba seed oil combined with shea butter provide nourishment for 24-hour hydration while delivering high-shine colour. Hyaluronic acid provides long-lasting hydration with subtle yet visible plumping and smoothing effects. Design and range: Beautiful shine and glowing colour featuring vibrant hues of red, pink, coral, and natural tones so you're sure to find your perfect shade. Product_Name: Designer Brands I GoTo Rio Bath & Shower Fizzer
full_description: Book in for an aroma-therapy session with these scented bathing buddies.Refreshingly fragranced, these fun-size fizzers will instantly transform your bath or shower into a spa-like sanctuary in seconds. How to use:FOR THE BATH:  Drop 1-2 fizzer cubes into a nice, warm bath and watch while they fizz and fragrance the water. Slowly submerge your body for a top to toe treat.  FOR THE SHOWER: Splash with warm water to activate scent and then place in a small dish on the shower floor out of the direct spray. Re-use until fully dissolved.

Product_Name: Prada Luna Rossa Ocean EDT 100ml Set
full_description: Prada Luna Rossa Ocean, a magnetic call for new discoveries built on a conviction that with technology as an extension of ourselves, we can push our limits beyond, re-imagine what's possible and open new horizons to create one of the most complimented fragrances. Prada Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Toilette is a fragrance augmented by the cutting-edge technology of molecular distillation, expanding the field of naturalness. Inspired by Prada fashion iconic ornament and designed with a unique detachable card.Set features:Prada Luna Rossa Ocean full-size bottle (100ml)Prada Luna Rossa Ocean travel spray (10ml)

Product_Name: Trudon Angelo candle 270g
full_description: For Christmas, Trudon builds on the opulence of Versailles: more, it revives the balls and masquerades once held by Louis XV at the Château. At the heart of the festivities, anything becomes possible. The four scented candles convey a royal art de vivre. On the inside, they are covered in 24-carat gold leaf, while on the outside, a royal décor comes to life with stylized chandeliers, pendants and curtains. Marked in hot gold, the decorations frame the gold coat of arms of the Royal Manufactory. On the back of the candle, a decorative chandelier hangs over Serdar Gülgün's signature. Angelo unfolds as a comforting woody-amber scent: rich with gourmand notes of orange and cinnamon, Angelo blends cashmere wood and marron glacé before revealing musky base notes.Fragrance notes:Angelo unfolds as a comforting woody-amber scent: rich with gourmand notes of orange and cinnamon, Angelo blends cashmere wood and marron glacé before revealing musky base notes.Head Notes: Birch Wood, Cinnamon, Leather, OrangeHeart Notes: Cashmere Wood, Glace Chestnut, MossBase Notes: Virginian cedarwood, Crackling WoodsFeatures:270gBurning time55 to 60 hoursDirections:In order to get the most out of your candle, burn it until the entire surface of the candle melts.To preserve the fragrance, do not burn your candle for more than 2 hours at a time during the first third of the candle and 1 hour at a time during the remaining.Do not leave candle burning unattended. Do not set in a draft. Keep away from children, curtains and pets.Should the wick require centering, gently readjust to correct position when the wax is still molten. Allow candle to solidify before relighting.Should any black smoke appear, trim the tip of the wick. It should be clean and no longer than 5mm at all times.Always protect the table or surface on which the candle rests (with a wood or ceramic plate, for example).Do not burn your candle all the way down. Always leave at least 5 mm of non-molten wax at the bottom.Keep your candle in a dry and temperate environment, between 60 and 80° F.The first use of your candle should occur within the two first months after its reception.

Product_Name: Trudon Absolu EDP 100ml
full_description: Discover Trudon Absolu Eau de Parfum, a fragrance that pays tribute to the elegance and power of Louis the XIV's reign. Taking inspiration both from the opulence of the court and the timeless beauty of the gardens of Versailles, this scent is an intoxicating blend of fresh citrus, white florals and warming spices, perfectly suited to any gender.Trudon Absolu opens with softly spiced notes of creamy cardamom and earthy saffron, with mandarin bringing a juicy burst of sweetness. Heart notes of incense and iris conjure the extravagance of the palace, while orange blossom absolute nods to the Sun King's love for the flower. Base notes of guaiac wood, cedar and tonka bean bring warmth and lasting depth, creating an addictive scent that celebrates fragrance in its most luxurious form.Trudon Absolu EDP notes:Head: Cardamom, mandarin, saffronHeart: Incense, iris, orange blossom absoluteBase: Guaiac wood, cedar, tonka beanCire Trudon: Scents with history Cire Trudon fragrances have the same sense of history, complexity and creativity as their candles. These eau de parfum scents are compelling and unique - you won't be wearing the same perfume as every other person at the bar. They're perfumes for perfume lovers. Once, every royal palace would have a team of staff to care for candles. Founded in 1643, Maison de Cire Trudon crafted candles for the royal court of Versailles. Cire Trudon candles still carry the emblem of King Louis XIV who created the Royal Wax Manufacture in Antony, which once belonged to the Cire Trudon family. With a gold seal inspired by a bas relief on the Royal Wax Manufacture, the Cire Trudon motto is a tribute to the bees that contributed to the Maison Trudon candles throughout the centuries. Though Cire Trudon candles are now made with a more environmentally friendly vegetable wax, you can still read the latin deo regique laborant” which refers to bees “doing work for god and king.”The Scent Room PromiseTake a chance on love. The Scent Room Promise applies to any full size fragrance.Your full-size purchase from Trudon will be accompanied by a complimentary matching fragrance vial. Use this fragrance vial before you unwrap your new fragrance, which allows you to live in your new scent before you have the freedom to unwrap the full size, or return.If it's not a perfect match for you, we accept returns on any unopened full size purchase from The Scent Room. Offer applies to full size bottles only. Terms and conditions apply, please read The Scent Room Promise & Returns page here.

full_description: Discover flawless, all-day coverage with the Max Factor Facefinity All Day Flawless 3-In-1 Foundation. This multi-tasking product combines the power of primer, concealer, and foundation into a single, easy-to-apply formula, creating a smooth, matte finish that's as enduring as it is lightweight. It easily adapts to your skin's movements, providing ultimate comfort and a fresh, radiant look that lasts all day. Get an effortless, photo-ready look with an oil-free foundation that blends perfectly with your natural tone. Why will I love Max Factor Facefinity All Day Flawless 3-In-1 Foundation?Oil-free, 3-in-1 formulaWaterproof foundationMedium to full coverageComes with SPF 20 protectionSize: 30 ml How to useDot the oil free foundation onto the forehead, nose, chin and cheeks.Using a tapered foundation brush, smooth the formula over skin, blending underneath the jawline, onto the neck and décolletage for natural-looking, even coverage.

Product_Name: Basics by B Lip Liner Florence
full_description: Basics by B Lip Liners deliver a luxurious matte finish with a glide-on formula that effortlessly defines and enhances your lips. Designed for smooth application, its creamy consistency leaves lips soft, smooth, and comfortable, creating a flawless base for any look. Perfectly matched to the Basics by B Velvet Lipstick range, each shade ensures a seamless, polished finish every time.  Whether used to outline, fill, or enhance your lips, these liners provide a velvety look with precision and ease. The rich, long-lasting formula complements the matching lipstick shades, making it a must-have for achieving perfectly defined, standout lips.  Why will I love the Basics By B Lip Liner?Luxe matte finish for a velvet lookCreamy, glide-on formula for smooth, skip-free applicationLeaves lips soft, smooth, and comfortablePerfectly matches Basics by B Velvet Lipstick shadesIdeal for defining, filling, and enhancing lipsHow to use the Basics By B Lip Liner:Outline your lips with the liner, starting from the Cupid's bow and working outward.
